title: Image location made by concave spherical mirror

content.description: The concave spherical mirror of radius r shown above has focal point F and center of curvature C. An object is placed at a distance 2r from the mirror.
content.question: Where will the image be formed?

choices.label: To the left of the mirror
To the right of the object
